Module piano_app
Package piano

Class MainFrame

java.lang.Object
piano.MainFrame
public class MainFrame extends Object
MainFrame class creates the main frame window with all components and functionalities.
Version:
1.1.2023
Author:
Rafa≈Ç Handzel 180481
